title: hello, my first post in oce boards

replies.body: Welcome, and it's good to see you being a positive influence on the fields of justice now.
hey man :D, yea i've really being working on my toxicity in this game, it's getting much better but still work to go :D how are you going woody senpai

true? 

http://puu.sh/cWY5x/9ccdb99f09.jpg

http://puu.sh/cWYaq/3aa0a917e7.jpg

Nice work being less toxic friend.

good try friend, its gd chat, its talking to friends. i don't think that matters to be honest. if you cant handle some banter then i think you need to toughen up lad. and plus nobody cares about our conversations, what matters most is being nice on boards/ forums and in game, private chat groups matter little to riot.
Talking to friends lmfao.. You were talking to me.

first words out of your mouth [9:36] AlphaCueSlowly: shut the %%%% up. hmmmmm ok then, well you can reply to this if you want but you're an idiot and i'm not gonna waste my time arguing over your pettiness
Hi that isn't me <3 I'm OC x o.
